ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Potters] Digest Number 76
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Plus if ... & ... why he ... That makes sense.  I can t imagine them ignoring our needs on purpose. They are always doing patches so they must be listening
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Battlestaff Fuzzietoe" <andrie@...>
>
> The Reason they do not read it is because Bug & Feedback are Broke.
Plus if
> it does some how get through do you know where it comes to? The Guides
&
> GM's which means it never gets passed on to Verant at all. So that is
why he
> said that they never read them is because he never sees them.
>
> Battlestaff Fuzzietoe, Mithaniel Marr
> 41rst Ranked Druid of Karana
> Master Brewer, Master Baker, Master Potter, Master Fletcher
>

That makes sense. I can't imagine them ignoring our needs on purpose.
They are always doing patches so they must be listening to someone and
are doing thing to try to improve the game. In my experience, even the
GMs in EQ are extremely helpful compared to other games I've played.
They really do try to do a good job I think.
